class.name: iHUD
class.comment: This library is based on MBProgressHUD open source project.

method.name: ToastMessageShow::
method.comment: Shows a "toast message". The message will disappear automatically after a few seconds.

method.name: ProgressDialogShow:
method.comment: Shows a dialog with animated progress wheel. User interaction is disabled until the dialog is dismissed.

method.name: ProgressDialogHide
method.comment: Dismisses the currently visible progress dialog.
